        public static <G> double[][] getEndpoints(AnnotatedBarcodeCollection<java.lang.Double,G> collection,
                          int dimension,
                          boolean skipInfiniteIntervals)
        This function returns an array containing the set of endpoint of the intervals.
        Type Parameters:
        G -
        Parameters:
        collection - the barcode collection
        dimension - the dimension at which to get the endpoints
        skipInfiniteIntervals - boolean flag indicating whether to skip infinite intervals
        Returns:
        an n x 2 array of doubles containing the endpoints of the intervals
